hero.name: José Manuel Alba Peña
hero.description: I consider myself a constant, communicative person, motivated by technical challenges that drive my professional growth.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience in the complete software development lifecycle. Specialized in MVC architecture and version control implementation, always prioritizing clean and scalable code.
about.p2: I am familiar with managing Sprints, user stories, and tasks within agile methodologies. Additionally, I have good capabilities for performing functional and technical analyses and estimates, ensuring project objectives are met.

salutic.title: Full Stack Developer
salutic.description: Full-cycle development of healthcare management and time-tracking systems.

p1.name: Staffy Project (Time & Attendance)
p1.desc: End-to-end development of a web application for employee time tracking and attendance management.

p2.name: Healthcare Data Management Platform
p2.desc: Management of a healthcare interoperability platform for the medical insurance sector.

bimaxpro.title: Frontend Developer
bimaxpro.description: Development of a web application for managing and processing sanitary tests in the logistics and fishing industry.

p1.name: Hygiene & Safety Analysis Platform
p1.desc: Development of an application to streamline sanitary testing procedures between fishing ports and laboratories.

horizonte.title: Career Vision
horizonte.p1: My goal is to join an organization that fosters continuous professional growth, providing access to <0>official certifications</0> and advanced training in cutting-edge technologies.
horizonte.p2: I am committed to continuously expanding my expertise by mastering new tools and methodologies, enabling me to deliver innovative and high-quality software solutions.

ia.title: Artificial Intelligence
ia.intro: I am familiar with using various Artificial Intelligence assistants to enhance development and productivity. These tools have allowed me to quickly adapt to new technologies and learn more efficiently. Below, I detail the ones I use regularly:
ia.copilot: Real-time code assistant to speed up writing, suggest optimizations, and refactor complex functions.
ia.notebook: Tool for creating presentations, generating summaries, and structuring technical documentation efficiently.
ia.antigravity: Collaborator in the development of this application. This technology has improved code quality and streamlined feature implementation, demonstrating the potential of AI-assisted programming.
ia.note_desc: I use these tools responsibly, always verifying data validity and consulting official documentation if the AI's response is not entirely convincing. Human supervision is key to ensuring software quality and correctness.

contact.title: Let's talk!
contact.subtitle: I am available for new challenges and professional opportunities.
